title: GPS Tracker and Location Database System for BUET Students
description: Monitors the current location of BUET buses with a short delay. Provides precise bus arrival information (90%+).

title: DL-based Automatic License Plate Detection System
description: Utilizes advanced deep learning algorithms(YOLO, ResNet) for accurate license plate detection.Ensures reliable and precise detection in various conditions.(85%+)

title: Smart Trash Collector Integrated with AI
description: Employs artificial intelligence to optimize trash collection processes. Automatically sorts waste into appropriate categories (recyclables, organic, etc.).

title: Single Board Oscilloscope, Freq-Gen, DC source Module
description: Developed an affordable single board that combines multiple functions. Oscilloscope-Provides real-time visualization of electrical signals. Generates precise frequencies for testing and experimentation. Offers adjustable DC voltage for various applications. Supplies a stable 12V output. Supplies a stable 5V output.

title: Smart Bike accident detection and Alarm system
description: Utilizes sensors to detect bike accidents in real-time.  Sends immediate alerts to emergency contacts and authorities upon detection of an accident.

title: Delivery Drone with Arduino
description: Utilizes Arduino for precise control and navigation of the drone.  Equipped with sensors to detect and avoid obstacles in real time.
